title: First SLASSCOM Chairperson honoured at International Women’s Day
body_lines: Sandra de Zoysa, the first female Chairperson of SLASSCOM and Group Chief Customer Service Officer of Dialog Axiata PLC, was the recipient of the National Vanitha Abhimana Award 2022 for the Corporate and Professional Sector and Information Technology. The event was held last evening to coincide with the International Women’s Day.
